n1.speaker: Birb
n1.text: Another great day [username], we are unstoppable!

n2.speaker: Birb
n2.text: Anyway, remember that mysterious letter we found? Let's go ask some people about it.

n3.speaker: Birb
n3.text: Hey Crowley, do you know who delivered this letter?

n4.speaker: Crowley
n4.text: No, but I know that mayonnaise and coffee isn't a good combination.

n6.speaker: Birb
n6.text: Chickita, have you seen this letter before?

n7.speaker: Chickita
n7.text: Huh, I think I saw someone carrying that the other week, but I'm not sure.

n8.speaker: Chickita
n8.text: They were headed to the hallway that is under construction. Maybe look there?

c1.speaker: Birb
c1.text: Hmmm, we're not supposed to go there because it could be dangerous. What do you think [username]?

choices.text: But what if you get hurt?!
Maybe we can just check out the entrance?

n9.speaker: Birb
n9.text: You're right! Next time we will head out for our investigation!

n10.speaker: Birb
n10.text: It does sound scary... we'll be very careful, but we can quickly look around.

n11.speaker: Birb
n11.text: Good idea! That's the best of both worlds!

n12.speaker: Birb
n12.text: Wow, this is turning into a real investigation! But I know we can do it together [username]!
